Articles.Content:
A minimized version of the Swan-42 at the fingertips of awesomeness.

This more compact version, the Wasp-42, offers the same amount of speed with striking turns and incredible strength. So far it is the easiest design to take off and land with VTOL RCS thrusters, due to it\'s easy to manage size.

Same X/horizontal hybrid design, making it incredible and fun to glide with. I\'m thinking no more than 2 railguns, most likely only one, and a few payloads. Unlike her older siblings she may aswell be used for private transport, or possibly an emergency spaceplane to escape from horrible distasters in orbit. Not much more to say here, that is until this beauty gets upgraded in the future! 8)

---Ansers to Questions Section---

.craft file and required, please?

that thing looks awesome.
